section.title: Configure the node-provision JSON file
section.p: Modify the node-provision.json file in the /var/hlm/clouds/<cloudname> directory of the lifecycle manager. This file supplies input values to the hprovision script, later in the installation.
Note: To see a sample node-provision.json file, see Sample node-provision.json File for Installing the KVM + ESX Topology.

ol.li:
Edit node-provision.json file to change only the following fields:
FieldDescription
Pxe-mac-addressThe MAC address of the interface you want to PXE boot onto. This is not same as iLO* MAC address.
pm_ipThe power management IP address (iLO IP address).
pm_userThe power management user name (iLO user name).
pm_passThe power management password (iLO password).
failure_zone, vendor, model, os_partition_size, data_partition_sizeThe values in these fields are added to the nodes.json file used during cloud deployment.
*iLO is HPE Integrated Lights-Out, a server management tool embedded with the ProLiant servers. Consult your iLO documentation for information on how to locate the iLO IP address, user name, and password.
